1999 NBA Playoffs Summary

1998 Playoffs Summary 2000 Playoffs Summary

League Champion: San Antonio Spurs

Finals MVP: Tim Duncan (27.4 / 14.0 / 2.4)


1999 Playoff Leaders:

PTS: Latrell Sprewell (407)

TRB: Tim Duncan (195)

AST: Avery Johnson (126)

WS: Tim Duncan (3.7)
